metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4342 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: xinetd does not enforce the user and group configuration directives for TCPMUX services, which causes these services to be run as root and makes it easier for remote attackers to gain privileges by leveraging another vulnerability in a service.

criterions.comment: xinetd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
